author: Amrith Ramkumar
title: Stocks to Watch: Walmart, Facebook, Disney, EA, ConocoPhillips, Papa John’s, ADT, TripAdvisor - MoneyBeat - WSJ
text: Here are some of the companies with shares expected to trade actively in Wednesday’s session. Stock movements reflect premarket trading. —Down 4.1%: Walmart confirmed previous reports and said it has agreed to take control of India’s largest e-commerce company, Flipkart Group, for $16 billion, the largest acquisition in the Bentonville, Ark.-based retailer’s history.
